pages.text: te'om tomalokara babe pracura paraimane barasuna barsaba
‘arau tomalokaka dhana-sampada arau santana-santati pradana karai sahaya karaiba arau tomalokara babe udyana sthapana karaiba arau nada-nadi prabahita karaiba
Tomalokara ki ha'la, tomaloke allahara sraesthatba upalabdhi nakaraa kiya
Tomaloke laksya karaa na'ine, allahe kenekai starae starae satakhana akasa srsti karaiche
arau e'iborara majata candraka srsti karaiche pohara hicape arau suryaka bana'iche pradipa
‘Arau allahe tomalokaka matira paraa udbhuta karaiche
‘tara pichata te'om tomalokaka talai ubhata'i niba arau niscitabharae tomalokaka punaraut'thita karaiba
‘arau allahe prthiraikhanaka tomalokara babe bistrta karaiche
‘yate tomaloke tata prasasta pathata calacala karaiba paraa’
Nuhe ka’le, ‘he mora pratipalaka! Sihamte moka aman'ya karaiche arau ene lokara anusarana karaiche yara dhana-sampada arau santana-santatiye kerala tara ksatihe brd'dhi karaiche’
arau sihamte kaiche, ‘tomaloke ketiya'o tomalokara upasyasakalaka barjana nakaraiba; arau paraityaga nakaraiba adda, churaa'a, iyagucha, iya'ukba arau nacharaka’
‘Niscaya sihamte bahulokaka pathabhrasta karaiche, arau (he allaha) tumi yalimasakalara babe bhrastatara bahirae ana eko brd'dhi nakaraiba’
Sihamtara aparaadhara babe sihamtaka duba'i diya ha’la tara pichata sihamtaka ju'ita praraesa karaoraa ha’la, eteke sihamte allahara bahirae ana kako sahayakarai hicape poraa nachila
Arau nuhe ka’le, ‘he mora pratipalaka! Prthiraira kaphirasakalara majara paraa kono grhabasika arasista naraakhiba
‘Yadi tumi sihamtaka arasista raakha tente sihamte tomara bandasakalaka pathabhrasta karaiba arau sihamte kerala duskrtikarai kaphirakahe janma diba

He mora pratipalaka! Moka arau mora pitr-matrka arau yiye muminahai mora gharata praraesa karaiba lagate mumina purausa arau mumina naraisakalaka ksama karai diya; arau yalimasakalara babe dhbansara bahirae ana eko brd'dhi nakaraiba’
